metadata.description: Short code for the name of the organisation.
Short code for the name of the top-level service that this infrastructure is underpinning.
Service stage 1 that this infrastructure is underpinning.
The suffix to use when doing a concat to keep the VM name within 15 characters.
The suffix to append when doing a concat for the VM's name.
Size of VM.  Please make sure that the SKU is available in the Azure Region being deployed to
The suffix to append when doing a concat for the VM's disk storage account name.
The suffix to append when doing a concat for the VM's disk storage account's resource group name.
The suffix to append when doing a concat for the VM's diagnostics storage account name.
The suffix to append when doing a concat for the VM's diagnostics storage account's resource group name.
The suffix to append when doing a concat for the VNet's name.
The suffix to append when doing a concat for the common resources resource group's name.
The suffix to append when doing a concat for Subnet 3's name.
The suffix to append when doing a concat for Subnet 4's name.
The suffix to append when doing a concat for the first NIC's name.

variables.diskStorageAccountResourceId: [resourceId(concat(parameters('orgCode'), '-', parameters('location1Code'), '-', parameters('serviceCode'), '-', parameters('serviceStage1Code'), '-', parameters('diskStorageAccountResourceGroupSuffix')), 'Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts', concat(parameters('orgCode'), parameters('location1Code'), parameters('serviceCode'), parameters('serviceStage1Code'), parameters('diskStorageAccountSuffix')))
variables.diagStorageAccountResourceId: [resourceId(concat(parameters('orgCode'), '-', parameters('location1Code'), '-', parameters('serviceCode'), '-', parameters('serviceStage1Code'), '-', parameters('diagStorageAccountResourceGroupSuffix')), 'Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts', concat(parameters('orgCode'), parameters('location1Code'), parameters('serviceCode'), parameters('serviceStage1Code'), parameters('diagStorageAccountSuffix')))
variables.subnet3ResourceId: [resourceId(concat(parameters('orgCode'), '-', parameters('location1Code'), '-', parameters('serviceCode'), '-', parameters('serviceStage1Code'), '-', parameters('commonResourcesResourceGroupSuffix')), 'Microsoft.Network/virtualNetworks/subnets', concat(parameters('orgCode'), '-', parameters('location1Code'), '-', parameters('serviceCode'), '-', parameters('serviceStage1Code'), '-', parameters('vnetSuffix'), '-', parameters('subnet3Suffix')))]
variables.subnet4ResourceId: [resourceId(concat(parameters('orgCode'), '-', parameters('location1Code'), '-', parameters('serviceCode'), '-', parameters('serviceStage1Code'), '-', parameters('commonResourcesResourceGroupSuffix')), 'Microsoft.Network/virtualNetworks/subnets', concat(parameters('orgCode'), '-', parameters('location1Code'), '-', parameters('serviceCode'), '-', parameters('serviceStage1Code'), '-', parameters('vnetSuffix'), '-', parameters('subnet4Suffix')))]

resources.name: [concat(parameters('orgCode'), '-', parameters('location1Code'), '-', parameters('serviceCode'), '-', parameters('serviceStage1Code'), '-', parameters('vmSuffix'))]
dependsOn: [concat('Microsoft.Network/networkInterfaces/', parameters('orgCode'), '-', parameters('location1Code'), '-', parameters('serviceCode'), '-', parameters('serviceStage1Code'), '-', parameters('vmSuffix'), '-', parameters('nic1Suffix'))]

vhd.uri: [concat('https://', concat(parameters('orgCode'), parameters('location1Code'), parameters('serviceCode'), parameters('serviceStage1Code'), parameters('diskStorageAccountSuffix')), '.blob.core.windows.net/vhds/', variables('osDiskName'), '.vhd')]
